function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unsustainable focus on business competitiveness and profitability over general well-being","Impact":"Neglect of public health and safety, leading to increased vulnerability to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Shift focus towards prioritizing public health and safety in policies and investments","Technologies":"None provided","People":"General populace, public health organizations","Owner":"Governments, policymakers, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Barriers to implementing circular economy principles","Impact":"Inability to achieve the intended social, economic, and environmental benefits of circular economy, leading to increased resource usage and waste generation","Mitigation":"Address technical, behavioral, financial, and regulatory barriers to CE implementation","Technologies":"Sustainable technologies for resource management and waste reduction","People":"Businesses, government bodies, environmental organizations","Owner":"Businesses, government bodies, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Socio-cultural considerations and operational challenges","Impact":"Hindrance to the successful implementation of circular economy principles and strategies","Mitigation":"Cultural and operational adaptation, stakeholder engagement, education and awareness programs","Technologies":"None provided","People":"Communities, businesses, government bodies","Owner":"Communities, businesses, government bodies"}]}
